phrases: I got to eat this before it melts.
Yeah, there is no summer without this.
He has not moved from there lately.
Even if I give him food he does not even look.
He is smart so he might have realized it already.
What happens to familiars when they learn that their master has died?
I thought he would not hear from this distance.
Probably he will revert to a demon with the connection gone.
They were sold out at the shop so I had to go all the way to the one behind the Academy.
And it is so hellishly hot in here.
A fancy school like this really should at least have aircon.
There is no helping it, this is an old building.
And we did not have aircon where we grew up, either.
Anyway, did you buy the mineral water I asked you to?
You see, the shadow of water is too pale... since it is transparent.
No thanks, I will go buy some myself.
Ah, why do I have to do homework and reports on a sunday like this?
I became that Esquire something, but nothing's changed from being a Page.
And look at this, Esquire is still at the bottom of it!
You are not so high either!
How long would it take to become the top, a Paladin?
I really want to go on missions and get some practical experience.
Paladin is a title given to only one person at a time.
It is not a rank that anyone can get.
But you will not be going on missions for a while.
You often ignore orders and act on your own.
You still cannot run errands at your age.
What is the problem, I said I was sorry!
That is not all of it.
You depend too much on Satan's power when you fight.
You should stop drawing your sword all the time.
And you should not use your body as a shield just because you heal quickly.
If you keep on like this you will get possessed by Satan's power.
What does it matter, I helped you!
Do not preach like the old geezer!
You were about to go down!
I am telling you this for your own sake!
He is probably rolling in his grave worrying about you.
As if the shitty old geezer was such a worrywart!
How long are you going to act like a rebellious child?
Will not you grow up already?
And how long are you going to act all cool and adult?
Do not get so full of yourself just because Shiemi always stares at you like you are the Eighth Wonder!
What does Shiemi have to do with this?
She is not staring at me at all, and I am not full of myself!
You are wearing glasses but you do not even notice that!
That is one stupid four-eyes for you!
Says my brother who cannot even run errands at his age?
Are you still going on about that?
You rely on power because you have neither knowledge nor skills.
This is nothing to laugh about!
It has nothing to do with you.
How many spares does he have?
I am Yukio Okumura, Middle First Class Exorcist.
We have been waiting for you.
I am worried about your glasses.
You are not even making sense.
And I do not have time to play with you now!
Blackie, the guardian Cat Sith of the southern rear gate has gone berserk.
We have sealed a mile of the road.
Suddenly he got all big and attacked us.
I let it slip that Reverend Fujimoto is dead.
What is going to happen to Blackie now?
We Exorcists will sort it out.
What does this have to do with the geezer's death?
That Cat Sith was Father's familiar.
They are demons that look like cats.
The Japanese ones' tail splits if they live long enough.
That Cat Sith was a protective god of silk for hundreds of years, and people worshipped him.
He protected silk from mice and fire.
In exchange, the people celebrated him and they lived in peace.
But as they stopped manufacturing silk, he was forgotten as well.
Having lost his place, he became a demon.
Holy water, holy silver, holy wine and holy medicines do not work either.
And we do not know his fatal verse yet, so Aria cannot help.
We hit him with lots of tranquilizers so he is slowed down a bit, but he recovers fast.
Did not Reverend Fujimoto tell you anything about him?
You were there on that mission, right?
Yukio was still an Esquire back then.
At a construction site in a certain village, more and more accidents happened.
The locals feared that something was haunting it, so they called worshippers.
But no matter what they did it did not help much, and the situation got hopeless.
As their last reserve, they called the True Cross Knight Order.
Paladin Fujimoto was appointed to kill the demonic god.
Do not worry, I will be fine by myself.
It was really impressing how he calmed the situation without spilling a drop of blood.
The old geezer was a Paladin?
So that is how it started...
Then Father named him Blackie and made a familiar contract with him to guard the gate of the Academy.
But he is a demon after all.
He lost his master and returned to his true nature.
Father prepared this just in case a situation like this would come.
If something happens to me and you cannot cope with Blackie, use this.
I made this myself, it will calm him down.
It is a reworked grenade, so it will probably kill him.
But we do not know what kind of grenade it is or how powerful it is, so I will do it alone.
I only need to throw it at him so I am fine by myself.
Then let us prepare for the worst and evacuate all other personnel.
Everyone, fall back to the gate!
Rin, you should retreat as well.
This drug might work on you, too.
Are you going to kill him?
There is no Exorcist at the Academy who could tame a demon of this level.
Now we have no choice but to kill him.
I will not die until then either!
But even then, we cannot leave him like this.
Then before that, let me try convince him!
Do not worry, I will not draw my sword.
I will fight using my head and without relying on Satan, just as you told me.
You loved my dad a lot, did not you?
That is why you got so sad.
You loved humans a lot, did not you?
That is why you got so sad when they forgot you.
I brought you some catnip wine.
It is too early to say.
He did not fight at all.
Yeah, he is always like this.
It annoys the hell out of me.
Do not you want to go serious on him?
But before that I would like to learn more about this Japan you love so much.
But I did not give you the infinity key for sightseeing.
He is already attached to you.
What is going to happen to him?
I went to great lengths and made them let you take him as your familiar.
Some other familiar will become the guardian of the gate.
He says it smells like Dad's present.
I should have known Father would not hurt Blackie.
I did not expect the old geezer was this amazing.
Let us raise a toast to Blackie and the old geezer!
This is not made for humans.
It is fine, just a gesture.
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
